property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single map and reduce task.

property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: The framework for running mapreduce jobs

property.name: mapreduce.map.memory.mb
property.description: Set the YARN container physical memory limits for Map processes.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.memory.mb
property.description: Set the YARN container physical memory limits for Reduce processes.

property.name: mapreduce.map.java.opts
property.description: Configure the JVM heap size for map processes. The size is 80% of the physical memory of YARN Map processes.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.java.opts
property.description: Configure the JVM heap size for reduce processes. The size is 80% of the physical memory of YARN Reduce processes.
